definition: A period of time during the night when noise and disturbances are expected to be minimized, typically observed in residential areas or public spaces. It is commonly referred to as a time of quietness and rest, allowing individuals to sleep undisturbed.

examples.german: Bitte halten Sie die Nachtruhe ein.
Die Nachtruhe wird durch laute Musik gestört.
examples.english: The night's rest is disturbed by loud music.
The night-time rest is legally regulated.

examples.german: Während der Nachtruhe ist Lärm verboten.
examples.english: Noise is prohibited during the night's rest.
